description:
Linux Mint 22 “Wilma” is the latest stable version of the popular Linux Mint distribution featuring the Cinnamon 6.2 desktop environment, up-to-date packages from the Ubuntu 24.04 LTS “Noble Numbat” repositories, and a newer kernel, namely Linux 6.8, for better hardware support.

The post You Can Now Upgrade Your Linux Mint 21.3 PC to Linux Mint 22, Here’s How appeared first on Linux Today.
title: You Can Now Upgrade Your Linux Mint 21.3 PC to Linux Mint 22, Here’s How

description:
The new autosave feature in the upcoming Konsole 24.12.0 version allows users to automatically save all terminal output to a file in real time.

The post Konsole 24.12.0 Introduces Automatic Session Saving Feature appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Konsole 24.12.0 Introduces Automatic Session Saving Feature

description:
Wine 9.14 rolls out with enhanced Mailslots, better ODBC driver support, user32 updates, and bug fixes. Here’s more on that!

The post Wine 9.14 Brings Enhanced ODBC Driver Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Wine 9.14 Brings Enhanced ODBC Driver Support

description:
After over a year in the making, wholly rewritten, the immutable Vanilla OS 2 Orchid is here with seamless updates, smooth operations, and more.

The post Vanilla OS 2 Orchid Released, Here’s What’s New appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Vanilla OS 2 Orchid Released, Here’s What’s New

description:
Linus Torvalds, the principal developer of the Linux kernel, has announced the release of Linux Kernel version 6.11 Release Candidate 1 (RC1) on 28 July 2024.

The post Linux Kernel 6.11 RC1 Arrives With a Focus on Stability & Hardware Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Linux Kernel 6.11 RC1 Arrives With a Focus on Stability & Hardware Support

description:
Hyprland tiling Wayland compositor has been accepted into Debian and is now part of its unstable repositories. Here’s more on that!

The post Hyprland Made Its Way to Debian Repositories appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Hyprland Made Its Way to Debian Repositories
